properties.name: Texas Tech Historic Campus District
properties.description: The historic core of Texas Tech University, roughly bounded by 6th St, University Ave, 19th St, and Flint St. (Texas Technological College Historic District).

properties.name: Student Residential Influence Zone
properties.description: Approximate residential zone north and east of campus that likely developed to house students, faculty, and staff.

properties.name: Cultural Corridor / Architectural Influence
properties.description: Zone showing where Texas Tech's architectural and cultural influence is strongest, including civic and academic buildings.

properties.name: Transit / Arterial Influence Zone
properties.description: Approximate area influenced by major roads and transit corridors shaped by Texas Tech-related growth.
